= Download =
There are two versions of SayMyName available. One for phones running Android 1.5 (called "Cupcake") and one for phones running a newer version (1.6 "Donut", 2.0, 2.0.1 and 2.1 "Eclair") of Android.

If your phone runs Android 1.5, you can download SayMyName at the [http://www.appbrain.com/app/org.mailboxer.android?install Android Market], [https://slideme.org/application/saymyname-0 SlideMe] and at [http://roadtoadc.googlecode.com/files/SayMyName.apk here].

Or scan this barcode with your phone:

http://lh3.ggpht.com/_ziYewd_4bAY/Sv6hnXnPpFI/AAAAAAAAAOk/skuU0fd6RiE/chart.png




If your phone runs Android 1.6 or higher, you can download SayMyName at the [http://www.appbrain.com/app/org.mailboxer.saymyname?install Android Market], [https://slideme.org/application/saymyname-dessert SlideMe] and at [http://roadtoadc.googlecode.com/files/SayMyName%20Dessert.apk here].

Or scan this barcode with your phone:

http://lh6.ggpht.com/_ziYewd_4bAY/Sv6hnYCKh7I/AAAAAAAAAOo/QwGr4F0MQI8/chart%20(1).png
